definition: (to express one's) true feelings/what is on one's mind/secret mind

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: I feel good when I am drunk, because I can tell you what I think in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 悬赏醉了的感觉真好，能对你说心里话。汉译英？

sentences.english: The Great Spirit saw her, and was listening.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的神灵看到了她，并且听到了她的心里话。

sentences.english: Don't wait untill it's too late!
sentences.chinese: 跟爱的人说心里话不要太迟。

sentences.english: It's good to be drunk, so that I can talk to you with my heart.
sentences.chinese: 悬赏醉了的感觉真好，能对你说心里话。汉译英？

sentences.english: I hope I can win it one more time.That's for sure.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我能在这里再获胜一次，这是我的心里话。

sentences.english: Some of them want to speak their piece.
sentences.chinese: 他们有些人想说心里话。

sentences.english: And love of people quarrel, and the strangers say the truth.
sentences.chinese: 和爱的人吵架，和陌生人说心里话。

sentences.english: We never confided in her, because she would blab.
sentences.chinese: 我们从不跟她说心里话，因她会说漏嘴。

sentences.english: But recently she has become somewhat mysterious , not so open-minded as before.
sentences.chinese: 可最近女儿有点神神秘秘，不再和妈妈讲心里话。

sentences.english: He has spoken his mind to me.
sentences.chinese: 他已把心里话对我说了。

sentences.english: The great spirit saw her, and was listening. - Indeed, he said...
sentences.chinese: 伟大的精神看到了她，并且听到了她的心里话。

sentences.english: Forgive me a dumb not to tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 原谅我是个哑巴不会说心里话。

sentences.english: You just talk with your heavenly Father about what’s on your mind.
sentences.chinese: 你仅仅是在与你的天父交谈，说出你的心里话。

sentences.english: There are other, more pleasant ways to convey matters of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 的确有一些其他更令人愉悦的方式来说说心里话。

sentences.english: The same sentiment guarded him from betraying himself.
sentences.chinese: 同样的情感也阻碍着他说心里话。
